net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.obj.entity
Class MultiPartEntity

java.lang.Object
  net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.obj.entity.MultiPartEntity

public class MultiPartEntity
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a form entity to send multiple parts together. Use this when uploading images/files. This code is based on the code from Rafael Sanches' blog. http://blog.rafaelsanches.com/2011/01/29/upload-using-multipart-post-using-httpclient-in-android/
